Interface Ai

public interface Ai
Provides access to AI related functionality.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isEnabled()
    Allows an extension to determine if it has access to AI functionality.
    Prompt
    prompt()
    Access functionality related to AI chat prompts.

  • Method Details

    • isEnabled

      boolean isEnabled()
      Allows an extension to determine if it has access to AI functionality.
      Returns:
      true if extension has access to AI functionality.

    • prompt

      Prompt prompt()
      Access functionality related to AI chat prompts.
      Returns:
      An implementation of the Prompt interface which exposes chat prompt functionality.
